Properties.Name: AzureAD

Fn::Join: return (False, "Could not create SAML IdP: " + str(e))
return (True, "SAML provider with ARN " + arn + " deleted")
return (True, "SAML provider with ARN " + arn + " already deleted.")
return (False, "Could not delete SAML IdP with ARN " + arn + ": " + str(e))
return (False, "Could not delete SAML IdP with ARN " + arn + ": " + str(e))
return (False, "Cannot update SAML provider " + arn + ": " + str(e))
